events.message: The candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, showcasing strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
John Doe's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on his experience mentioned with software development and cloud services.
Recruiter Sarah Lee has been assigned to manage John Doe's application process for the software engineer role, ensuring personalized guidance throughout.
Completed initial phone screening with John Doe where he demonstrated clear knowledge of software design patterns and scalable cloud architecture.
John Doe responded promptly and positively to our screening feedback, expressing strong enthusiasm to continue with technical interviews.
Scheduled a technical interview for John Doe with the senior engineering team, focusing on software development skills and cloud deployment experience.
